title: Intel i7-8700K vs i7-2600K - FINALLY Time to Upgrade Sandy Bridge?
description: Is it FINALLY time to upgrade?  User of older Intel Sandy Bridge systems have been asking themselves that for years.  But now with Coffee Lake here, could this FINALLY be the time to upgrade.  Maybe.....but then again, maybe not. We will run some benchmarks to find out!  **Sponsor**  BUY NZXT AER FANS & SAVE 25%! (USA Only) AER RGB:   AER F:   AER P:   Follow this link to save 25% on MORE from NZXT:    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  i7 2600K -  i7 6700K -  i7 7700K -  i7 8700K - Out of Stock  Subscribe    This video is sponsored by NZXT. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  ------------------------------------------------------- Skyknock & Allay - Lucid Dream (Original Mix)   Sundriver - Orion (Intro Mix)   #sandybridge #intel8700k #intel2600k #hardwarecanucks
